entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Icon Button in ToolBar does not change the Size In Windows Plarform #22210

Closed

  • Maui Popup ArgumentNullException Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'handler.Container') PopupHandler.MapSize(PopupHandler handler, IPopup view) #22212

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] Span's TapGestureRecognizer not working if text is truncated #22213
    community ✨

Updated

  • [Android] Geolocation IsListeningForeground property is always false #21919
    platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
